extendedInfo.description: Keep track of your classes, school assignments, homework, and exams with ease using the Grades: Student Organizer from Android Infinity Software. Watch your attendance, manage your time semester by semester or day by day, keep a record of your test scores and monitor your GPA using different grading styles and grade scales for each course to match the standards for every teacher and professor. Store professor and teacher contact information and email them from within this intuitive, well-organized app. A multiple-view calendar shows your daily schedule, weekly plans, attendance tracking, a general schedule, and includes Google Calendar integration with handy reminders and computer data import options.Keep track of your test scores for individual courses and special exams such as the SAT, GRE, MCAT, AP, and more in your profile. Create weighted categories such as homework and exams for different grading systems, or take the total points to determine your grades for each class. Lock your grades down by setting a pin number for privacy. Manage your assignments with upcoming dues dates and overdue alerts. Backup your profile to either your SD card or via email so that you never have to worry about losing your data.

reviews.title: Best of a bad bunch...
reviews.comment: Cannot find an app yet that matches istudiez. This was only slightly better than others on Android but nowhere near same functionality of the Apple Wonder app...
reviews.author: Hannah Muir

reviews.title: Grade Ys is way better
reviews.comment: I\'m at university and I tried using this app but it simply doesn\'t cater for my needs. Try Grade Ys, that works perfectly and the design is so sexy!
reviews.author: Ed Woollard

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: This app is okay, would like to have more customization options and there are some glitches with inputing dates and syncing with Google calendar. Please add some widgets or something to make it worth the money ! Also grades options could be improved  *Edit* apparently the developers cannot be found and no updates have happened since 2011 .. not sure a paid app should be allowed on the market when the developer disappears
reviews.author: Cassandra Jones

reviews.comment: Too many options for it\'s own good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DROID CHARGE
reviews.comment: This app is Amazing! By far the best thing on the market. It looks a little \"outdated\" at times, but be fooled this thing does everything I want... and then some. There are still features I don\'t use on this app, far better than anything else I\'ve tested!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great organizer, but some bugs.
reviews.comment: Being able to manually change course grade and overall GPA would be nice, as it is, currently, way off of my unofficial college transcript GPA, as well as over 40 credits over.  An easier way to enter info would also be nice, as the desktop program never worked very well for me, and typing in all of my categories, classes, and other fiddly bits is tiresome.  However, it is still an excellent app for keeping track of your classes and has a widget to monitor your due tasks.  Droid X CM7GB.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Good App, with Room to improve.
reviews.comment: I really like this app.  My big complaint is that it takes forever to enter in information.  It says you there is a tool on the developer\'s website, but that site is no longer available.  Being able to sync across devices would be nice.  I plan to use my tablet a lot for school, but it would be nice if my phone was upto date as well, so I don\'t have to pull out the tablet just to check what is coming up next.  If I were to write an app to track my progress in school, it would be very much like this one.  This is the best app I have found so far, just a few things that could be better.
reviews.author: Josh Jensen

reviews.title: GREAT EXCEPT FOR CALENDAR INTEGRATION!
reviews.comment: I love this except for the fact that it destroyed my Google Calendar.  It inserted course events at random times and dates and deleted all of my recurring events. App said this wouldn\'t happen so I\'m upset.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best app of its kind on android. I\'ll give 5/5 stars as soon as I can use Dropbox or something to easily sync my phone and tablet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I use this mainly to keep track of my grades, though it\'s really useful as an assignment reminder, but I need to change the grading scale PER class.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, one flaw
reviews.comment: I really like this app, but when adding items, it always starts the date at Jan 1, 1900.  Otherwise, great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good, but buggy
reviews.comment: For some reason I often have to enter items twice sometimes, since they often don\'t save when I hit the check mark. Also, this app really needs a batch item feature. I like to put all of my homework in at the beginning of each term and putting in weekly homework one item at a time is beyond tedious.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recently downloaded
reviews.comment: Some dates start at Jan 1 1900 and when adding assignments you have to adjust time each time. It should default to class start. Also cannot add calendar events on ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sweet application. I definitely notice the improvement. Can you make the widget \"live\" to where it automatically plays through your to-do list?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool App but.......
reviews.comment: Since the developers website is gone, I can not get to the import tool which is one of the things I really wanted with this app. Other than that, seems like a good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s okay, functions. But, UI is totally unintuitive--a barrier to regular use. Rarely gets updated. Evo 2.3, NS 2.3. Class Buddy is far superior.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Awesome to keep track of scores, from a point system or weighted. Only issue I have is that it changes due dates and times almost always. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good system. Only one annoyance since I upgraded to the galaxy s3 it doesn\'t see any the system calendar/any calendar so I can\'t sync it with that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app has a lot of features and the UI isn\'t terrible. The calendar sync only works for the first class. Class Buddy seems to be less glitchy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mediocre at best
reviews.comment: The fact that this app hasn\'t been updated since early 2011 is a pretty good indication about how much the dev cares about it. Save your coffee money and look elsewhere.
reviews.author: John La
